Package etc.aloe.filters

Class Summary
AbstractRegexFilter Abstract class representing a Weka filter that detects occurrences of regular expressions in a specific string field.
AbstractRegexFilter.NamedRegex A mapping entity between names (feature names) and regular expressions.
PronounRegexFilter A filter that searches for occurrences of known pronouns, in several categories.
PunctuationRegexFilter Filter that searches for occurrences of punctuation characters.
SimpleStringToWordVector Extension of Weka's StringToWordVector filter that allows a string attribute to be specified by name, and uses a special term filter (NoNonsenseStemmer).
SimpleStringToWordVector.NoNonsenseStemmer  
SpecialRegexFilter Filter that searches for occurrences of special strings (negations, names, and swearing)
SpellingRegexFilter Filter that looks for occurrences of certain words and spelling variations.
StringToDictionaryVector Based on Weka's StringToWordVector, this derives its initial word list from a provided lexicon instead of the string attribute.
